author: ts:ez.no
msg: # Originally the $options parameter to ezcConsoleTable was an istance of
# ezcConsoleTableOptions. We use an array by default now.

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Refined exception message to conform standards.

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Remove "array or" from the setOptions() exception, if neither an array nor
the specific implementation of ezcBaseOptions is submitted.

author: fh:ez.no
msg: - Added workaround for bug #8271: New bug: Mail parsing bug in email with PGP signature.
We don't support GPG at the moment, however we now recognize it and ignore keys
